Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: Congrats on 1 month sober!  I’ve also jumped between ED, self-harm, pills, and alcohol abuse. For me, it largely seems to be ‘maladaptive coping’ and manifestations of Borderline Personality Disorder. DBT has been moderately life-changing. I’m still struggling but at least I’m no longer ending up at the hospital every other week.  I hope you find healthy tools that work for you <3
